interactives.title: Welcome to Grafana
interactives.summary: Take a guided tour of Grafana's key areas and set up your first data source. Perfect for getting started and understanding where everything is located.

interactives.title: Create Your First Dashboard
interactives.summary: In this tutorial, we'll make your first dashboard, of Grafana news. Learn to install plugins, create data sources, build dashboards, and set up basic alerting.

interactives.title: Welcome to Grafana Cloud
interactives.summary: Take a guided tour of Grafana Cloud's key areas and set up your first data source. Perfect for getting started and understanding where everything is located.

interactives.title: Prometheus & Grafana 101
interactives.summary: Learn to use Prometheus and Grafana to monitor your infrastructure. Perfect for getting started and understanding where everything is located.
